title: Yezdi is Back: Jawa-maker Classic Legends expands its mid-size motorcycle portfolio, work afoot on EVs too
description: While Classic Legends stuck to the retro theme with all the Jawa motorcycles, it is taking a slightly modern flavour with the Yezdi brand. The three motorcycles sport contemporary designs and digital instrument clusters. The company also recently revived the iconic British motorcycle brand BSA in the UK. The motorcycles will eventually make their way to India, Classic Legends co-founder Anupam Thareja told ET in an interview.
